data.name: RIFT - 7-day FREE Patron Pass
data.detailed_description:
Get 7 days of FREE RIFT Prime server access and see what you’ve been missing.



RIFT Prime has ascended to a new level thanks to server-wide improvements, plus the release of content from RIFT’s first expansion: Storm Legion.

There’s never been a better time to try RIFT Prime.

7-DAY TRIAL CAN ONLY BE REDEEMED ONCE PER ACCOUNT
 

STORM LEGION UPDATE

  • Increased Level Cap: Rise to a new level of power.
  • Grandmaster Crafting: Take your crafting to the next level.
  • 2 Massive Continents: Set and out and explore the lethal new lands of Brevane and Suken, or seek respite in Tempest Bay.
  • Classic Dungeons & Raids: Test your skill against some of RIFT’s most beloved encounters and enemies.
  • The Return of Volan, the Empyrean Colossus: Can you topple this fearsome titan?

RIFT PRIME UPDATE

  • XP Rebalance: Forget the grind and level faster than ever.
  • Warrior Overhaul & Massive Soul Update: Get better balance and better gamplay.
  • New Character Slot: Got alts? Now you do.

PATRON BENEFITS

RIFT PRIME SERVER ACCESS
RIFT Prime is a brand new type of RIFT server. When the RIFT Prime server first opens, content and level caps will be restricted to that of the original RIFT launch. Additional zones and raids will be released gradually, allowing RIFT Prime players to experience each set of content from RIFT's history in sequence.
 

Plus these benefits on RIFT live servers!

FAVOR & PRESTIGE
40% boosts to PvP XP and reputation gain.
 
MOUNTED COMMAND
Travel faster with +10% Mount Speed, +25% faster mounting, and -5% chance to be dismounted.
 
BONUS TOKENS
40% boost to currencies from dungeons, crafting and more!
 
PATRON SUMMONS
Instant access to your Banker, Guild Banker, and Trainer.
 
BONUS EXPERIENCE
40% XP boost helps you level faster to 60 and beyond…or toggle it off if you’d rather take it slow!
 
EXTRA CURRENCY
Earn +15% currency (always on).
 
AFFINITY LOGIN REWARDS
Gain daily rewards and bonuses just by logging in to RIFT.
 
MARVELOUS LUCK
Get rewarded with an increased chance for Marvelous loot from Supply Crates!
 
BONUS LOOT
Get a free Supply Crate each week.
 
ARTIFACT TRACKING
Reveal artifacts on your minimap for 30 minutes each day!
 
EXTRA DAILY QUESTS
Get +10 to your Daily Quest limit!
 
LOYALTY
Earn more veteran rewards the longer you subscribe.
 
NOTORIETY
40% boost to PvE reputation gain.
 
PRIORITY QUEUE
Move to the front of the line when your shard is full.
 
STORE DISCOUNT
Get 10% off all purchases made with Credits in the RIFT Store.
 
PATRON FAST PASS
Teleport on the go without a Porticulum (no matter where you are!) once every 30 mins.
 
WEEKLY BONUS CHARGES
+3 Bonus Reward Charges for Random Dungeons and Warfronts each week.
 
PATRON’S RADIANCE
Let your inner nature shine with a special cosmetic ability reserved for Patrons!
 
OVERLORD
Your Minions love a good Overlord, earning +5% XP on each of their.

data.short_description: Get 7 days of FREE RIFT Prime server access and see what you’ve been missing. Enrich your adventures through the vibrant and vast realms of Telara by becoming a Patron! As a RIFT Patron, you’ll enjoy the fullest game experience in addition to a huge range of exclusive benefits, including RIFT Prime server access.
data.supported_languages:
French*, German*, English*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce FX 5900, ATI/AMD Radeon X300, Intel GMA X4500 or better.
  • DirectX®: 9.0c, June 2010 update
  • Hard Drive: 15.0 GB available
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compliant card
  • Other: Broadband internet connection (DSL, cable modem or other high speed connection)
